Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Paul Valentine Jr.
Summary: Grants retroactive membership in Tier II of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Paul Valentine Jr.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Paul Valentine Jr.
